    • Constructor Detail

      • ReserveDate

        ReserveDate​(int month,
            int date,
            int time)
        Constructor to create array of reservation day slots for each timeslot It is also to check whether the time now has expired
        Parameters:
        month - An integer representing the current month now
        date - An integer representing the current date now
        time - An integer representing the current time now

    • Method Detail

      • reserveR

        public int reserveR​(int time,
                    int date,
                    int pax,
                    java.lang.String Name)
        The main method to reserve table using date, time, pax and Name
        Parameters:
        time - An integer representing the time the customer would like to reserve
        date - An integer representing the date that the customer would like to reserve
        pax - An integer representing the number of pax that would be reserved
        Name - A string representing the name of the customer reserving
        Returns:
        An integer representing the tableId

      • getListfromMonth

        private void getListfromMonth​(int month)
        As each month has a different number of days, this method would create an array of different lengths based on the month that was input i.e. July is "7" and July has 31 days hence this method would create an array of 31 reserveTime objects
        Parameters:
        month - An integer representing the current month

      • removeReserveR

        public void removeReserveR​(int time,
                           int date,
                           int table,
                           boolean printResult)
        Removes reservation base on date, time and table
        Parameters:
        time - An integer that represents the time that the customer booked 0 means 12pm and 9 means 9pm (after 9pm it's not allowed)
        date - An integer that represents a date that the customer booked 1 means 1st day while 31 means the 31st day
        table - An integer representing the table that the staff will remove reservation from
        printResult - A boolean representing if the table is reserved

      • checkReservation

        public void checkReservation​(boolean choice,
                             int time,
                             int date,
                             int pax)
        Removes reservation base on date, time and table
        Parameters:
        time - An integer that represents the time that the customer booked 0 means 12pm and 10 means 10pm
        date - An integer that represents a date that the customer booked 1 means 1st day while 31 means the 31st day
        choice - A boolean to choose whether to see the empty tables or reserved table true checks for empty tables and false checks for reserved tables
        pax - An integer representing the number of pax for the NEW reserved table

      • updateReservation

        public void updateReservation​(int time,
                              int date,
                              int pax,
                              int table)
        A method to update the reservation, could update to a new date/time or just increase the pax, so they have to change to another table
        Parameters:
        date - An integer representing the original reservation date slot
        time - An integer representing the original reservation time slot
        pax - An integer representing the new pax required, e.g. the customer might have originally requested for only 2pax but changed their mind to 6 pax hence input 6
        table - An integer representing the original table booked

      • checkTableReservation

        public boolean checkTableReservation​(int date,
                                     int time,
                                     int table)
        Checking reservation for a specific table currently
        Parameters:
        date - An integer representing current date
        time - An integer representing current time
        table - An integer representing original tableId
        Returns:
        true if the table is reservable else it will return false
